ygData.subject: RE: -----PRESS RELEASE-----
ygData.msgSnippet: I m actually happy to see most EQ local players, if not all, are united even across different servers. I heard a sad news last night from one of my UO local
ygData.messageBody:
I'm actually happy to see most EQ local players, if not all, are united
even across different servers.

I heard a sad news last night from one of my UO local kakis. Some S'pore
players play in Hotuko (something like tat, a Japanese server but give
pretty good connection for most local players). Few days back my kakis
found a house which is going to decay, so he stay there to place a house.
Later some S'pore players and Jap players come. Those S'pore players who
come, know my friend is also a local player, kill him so they can place a
house at the spot, and the Jap players laugh at them fighting amg their own
country man, sigh.
This news really upset me. I dun understand why our own countrymen have to
fight amg ourselves and become others' laughting stocks.
If anyone of you also play in UO, pls dun fight ya own countrymen unless
both are role-playing good and evil parties. If other country players (eg
Jap, they are very unite) can unite even in a game, I dun see why we S'p
orean, can't do that.

Ziltus (aka Dark Flame in Baja server)

On Sunday, 02 January, 2000 11:05 PM, Gabriel Kang
[SMTP:chaotic@...] wrote:
> From: Gabriel Kang <chaotic@...>
>
> (Press Release - Singapore)
>
> We ushered in the new year with parties and great
> celebrations , many of us were on holiday and may
> have even leveled up . With the aftermath of the new
> year , and the assurance that our servers have not crashed
> and all the user records were not deleted .....
>
> 2 servers have celebrated in cool fashion with creation of 2 sisters
guilds .
> After a much heated debated on the guild names...
> (Actually we just spent 10-15mins
> everyone wanted to get back to EQ)
>
> On Erollisi Marr we have ...
> The "Lions of Erollisi"
> (*Estimated 30+ members)
>
> On Lanys T'Vyl we have ...
> The "Lions of Lanys"
> (*Estimated 15+ members)
>
> *Estimates based on number of known singaporeans
> based there .
>
> Both guilds have agreed to work together to provide a solid
> enviroment for EQ'ers in Singapore . (Duh!)
>
>
> Happy New Year and Let the the Good Times Roll...
>
>
> (Press Release Unquote)
>
>
> WOOHOO !
> Those of u still undecided whether or not
> to start in a new server should give Lanys
> a try . Its quite a good playing enviroment .
> There are actually quite a large number of
> newbies who just got the game for christmas
> or never got beyond level 20 in their old servers...
>
> Come on .... Guk is still EMPTY...
> What are u waiting for ? =)
>
> Mezz , 16th Circle of Enchantment
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
